translations: 佩奥特掌（仙人掌的一种）

sentences.sentence: Mojave academy: Upstairs cosmetics academy as staged mix of desert landscape, case-study desert modernism and peyote cacti.
sentences.translation: 莫哈维学院：楼上的化妆学院与沙漠场景融合，模仿沙漠现代主义和仙人球的艺术。

sentences.sentence: I would like you to bring me the fruit of the Peyote . I will prepare you a meal from that fruit, this meal will make you have a very special dream.
sentences.translation: 我希望你给我带一些沙地仙人掌的果实来，这样我就可以给你准备这种果实做的菜肴，它将会给你一个特别的梦。
